full_summary:
# Forest Sector Intelligence, Reports, and Forecasting Data

## Contract Award Notice

### Contract Overview
The Government of Canada intends to award a contract for the provision of forest sector intelligence, reports, and forecasting data. This contract will support the development of federal government policies and programs by providing critical economic information, analyses, and assessments.

### Contract Details

- **Contract Title**: Forest Sector Intelligence, Reports, and Forecasting Data
- **Reference**: cb-636-66662539
- **Solicitation Number**: 5000076353
- **Update Number**: 6
- **Publication Date**: 2023-11-01
- **Closing Date**: 2023-11-16T14:00:00
- **Amendment Date**: 2023-11-16
- **Expected Start Date**: 2024-01-01
- **Expected End Date**: 2026-12-31

### Contract Objectives
The contracted supplier will provide regular updates on the current state and forecasts for forest industry subsectors, including lumber, timber, structural and non-structural panels, and mass timber markets in North America and Canada's key trading partners.

### Trade Agreements
This contract is open to suppliers from countries participating in the following trade agreements:

- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

### Evaluation Criteria
The contract will be awarded based on the qualifications of the pre-identified supplier.

### Contact Information
For further details, please contact:

Gerald Baran
Director, Policy and Economics Analysis
Natural Resources Canada
506 Burnside Road West
Victoria, British Columbia V8Z 1M5
Phone: 778 350 9373
Email: [gerald.baran@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca](mailto:gerald.baran@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca)

### Attachments
The contract requirements can be accessed at:

https://canadabuys.canada
